name: Social Work and Research Centre
briefDescription: Our exceptional work is a direct result of our approach, adopted from the principles of Mahatma Gandhi. The Barefoot College is one of the few places in India where Gandhiâ€™s spirit of service and thoughts on sustainability are still alive and respected.Our approach is demystifying and decentralising technology.Provide access to facilities to the poorest of poor ,work with the most marginalized and backward communities to live with dignity having access to all the basic needs regardless of they being a woman,are illiterate or semi literate and from rural areas.Our approach has been a continuous effort to integrate communities work respecting their traditional knowledge and skills with the national Government policies to get clean.
